General.Name: AB Ignitis grupe
General.Description: AB Ignitis grupe, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the generation and distribution of electricity and heat. It operates in four segments: Green Generation, Networks, Flexible Generation, and Customers & Solutions. The company also generates renewable electricity; supplies liquefied natural gas; trades and distributes natural gas; and constructs, repairs, maintains electricity networks and related equipment, as well as connects customers to electricity networks. In addition, it is involved in the development and operation of wind projects; production of metal structures; management of real estate properties; rental, leasing, repairing, and maintenance services for vehicles; planning, optimization, forecasting, trading, brokering, and other electricity related services; and payment aggregation services. The company operates in Lithuania, Latvia, Finland, Poland, Estonia, and internationally. AB Ignitis grupe was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Vilnius, Lithuania.
